Class ReportHelper

java.lang.Object
com.project.Helpers.ReportHelper
public final class ReportHelper extends Object
Helper responsible for building a textual report of gameplay. Contains convenience methods to add turn summaries and produce final output.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ReportHelper(ArrayList<Player> players, String caseId)
    Create a ReportHelper for the supplied players and optional case id.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addTurnSummary(String entry)
    Append a single turn summary line to the in-memory report buffer.

    Add a final scores section to the report (player name and score per line).

  • Constructor Details

    • ReportHelper

      public ReportHelper(ArrayList<Player> players, String caseId)
      Create a ReportHelper for the supplied players and optional case id.
      Parameters:
      players - list of players participating in the game
      caseId - optional case identifier (may be null and set later)

  • Method Details

    • initReport

      public void initReport()
      Initialize the report content with the header, case id and player list. This is invoked during construction to prepare the report buffer.

    • setCaseId

      public void setCaseId(String caseId)
      Set or update the case identifier used in the report header. If the report header has already been written to the buffer, update the existing header line so subsequent output uses the new case id.
      Parameters:
      caseId - the case identifier to embed in the report

    • addTurnSummary

      public void addTurnSummary(String entry)
      Append a single turn summary line to the in-memory report buffer.
      Parameters:
      entry - a textual summary describing a single turn

    • finalScores

      public void finalScores()
      Add a final scores section to the report (player name and score per line).

    • getReport

      public ArrayList<String> getReport()
      Produce the final report as a list of lines. This will append the final scores section before returning the buffer.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of report lines
